name: ASTROS
description: Astro Armadillos, a pioneering Web3 education project, is at the forefront of imparting knowledge about blockchain technology and Web3 across multiple chains through innovative non-fungible tokens (NFTs) and engaging game modes. Gear up for action with ASTROS, the powerhouse native token of Stargating and the electrifying Astro Armadillos universe! Embark on thrilling missions within the game and claim your share of ASTROS along with other exclusive rewards. But that's just the beginning â€“ once in your possession, ASTROS unlock a treasure trove of possibilities at the Stargating Store. From game-changing magic boosts to life-saving health potions and devastating weapons, there's no limit to the arsenal you can amass with ASTROS. Elevate your Play- to-Earn adventure to new heights as you equip yourself with the tools necessary to dominate every challenge Stargating throws your way.
